definition[0]: feeling that you want to thank someone because of something kind that they have done, or showing this feeling
example[0]: Our grateful thanks go to all who participated.
example[1]: She gave me a grateful look.
example[2]: I am extremely grateful for the assistance your staff have provided.
example[3]: I’m so grateful for all your help.
example[4]: I am very grateful to all those who took the trouble to write to me.
example[5]: She should be grateful that he was making things easier for her.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say I appreciate it rather than I’m grateful:
